Privacy Policy for Rideer Driver App

Effective Date: 2025-09-27

1. Introduction
Rideer Driver App (“we”, “our”, “us”) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our app. By using Rideer Driver App, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

2. Data Collected
- Account Information: Name, email, phone number, vehicle details, driver license information, and gender (if provided).
- Location Information: GPS location to match drivers with riders.
- Usage Information: Data about rides accepted, earnings, app interactions, and performance.
- Device Information: IP address, device model, OS version, and network information.

3. How We Use Your Data
- To match drivers with riders nearby.
- To track rides, earnings, and driver performance.
- To communicate important updates, offers, and notifications.
- To ensure safety and security for both drivers and riders.
- To analyze usage trends and improve app performance.

4. Permissions Explained
- Internet and Network State: Required to connect the app to servers, fetch ride requests, and provide real-time updates.
- Location (Fine and Coarse): Required to find your current location, track rides, and provide route guidance.

5. Payment Information
- Rideer Driver App does not currently process driver payments directly.
- In the future, secure third-party payment systems may be integrated for payouts.

6. Data Sharing
We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with:
- Riders, for ride fulfillment purposes.
- Service providers for analytics and support.
- Legal authorities if required by law.

7. Security
We use standard industry practices to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

8. Demo Mode Disclaimer
- Rideer is currently in demo mode. While users can book rides and drivers will see ride requests in the app, there are no real drivers in the physical world at this time. This is for testing purposes only.

9. Changes to this Privacy Policy
We may update this policy from time to time. Users will be notified of significant changes through the app.

10. Contact Us
For questions or concerns regarding your privacy, contact us at: anandsagar0006@gmail.com
